text: Werner, Count in Hesbaye (died 973) was a count in Hesbaye, now in Belgium. During his life he held lands in the Condroz, and lands as far away as ZÃ¼lpich, now in Germany. All the areas he was associated with were part of the Kingdom of Lotharingia, and Count of Hainaut. Category:970s deaths Category:Counts of Hainaut
title: Werner Count in Hesbaye
